welcome_message_body: Welcome to Wellington, a charming city known for its rich history, cultural diversity, and stunning natural beauty. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this unique city has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: Wellington Grille
restaurants.description: Wellington Grille is a steakhouse located in Wellington.

restaurants.name: Taco John's
restaurants.description: Taco John's is a fast food restaurant located in Wellington.

restaurants.name: Subway
restaurants.description: Subway is a sandwich spot located in Wellington.

restaurants.name: Taco Bell
restaurants.description: Taco Bell is a taco restaurant located in Wellington.

restaurants.name: Burger King
restaurants.description: Burger King is a fast food restaurant located in Wellington.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Exeter Airport handles all commercial flights and offers a range of services and amenities for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a code from the information desk.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yeovilton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cardiff Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.
